mapper.select: SELECT D.deposit_id, D.amount, D.deposit_status, D.rental_id, I.title AS item_title, U.nick_name AS counterparty_nick_name FROM Deposit D JOIN Rental R ON D.rental_id = R.rental_id JOIN Item I ON R.item_id = I.item_id JOIN "User" U ON I.user_id = U.user_id WHERE R.user_id = #{user_id}
